subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Harvard’s new basketball coach Tommy Amaker restored the reputation of Michigan’s basketball program, but was fired for his failure to guide the Wolverines to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Harvard’s new basketball coach Tommy Amaker restored the reputation of Michigan’s basketball program, but was fired for his failure to guide the Wolverines to the N.C.A.A. tournament.
